Name: Workshop 01 - Introduction to Computer Vision
Description: Basic and engaging workshop to understand how computers 'see' images and manipulate them

Name: Session 01 - Introduction to AI-ML
Description: An overview of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML), along with their various domains and a look at popular tools used in these fields.

Name: Workshop 02 - Recommender Systems Demystified: Uncover Netflix's Secrets!
Description: Deep dive into one of the recommendation system algorithms, SVD(Singular Value Decomposition), that makes the social media feeds come alive! Which was used to build a movie recommender system.
